title: Apply exact hero logo src + className on the selected element

requirements.text: In frontend/src/App.tsx, update ONLY the Hero section logo element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1] so that it exactly uses src="/assets/Gadget Zone-Logo-1.png" and has className="h-24 md:h-32 mx-auto mb-6". Do not change any other attributes of this element (e.g., alt) and do not change any other elements, layout, text, buttons, styling, or sections.

quotes: Use the XPath expression to identify the element to edit. The user instructions should be applied ONLY to the element selected in this prompt.

acceptanceCriteria: In frontend/src/App.tsx, the hero logo (XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1]) has src exactly "/assets/Gadget Zone-Logo-1.png".
That same has className exactly "h-24 md:h-32 mx-auto mb-6".
No other attributes on that are changed (including alt).
No other code/markup/styling anywhere else in the project is modified as part of this change.

constraints: Apply changes ONLY to the selected element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/section[1]/div[2]/div[1]/img[1].
Do not modify any other hero content (headings, text, gradient overlay, Call/WhatsApp buttons) or any other page sections.
Do not add new sections, animations, promotional elements, or backend logic.
nonGoals: Generating or editing any image assets.
Changing the hero slider behavior or timing.
Fixing any other known issues (brand logo strip clipping, business highlights interactions, map embedding/links) unless directly required by the single selected change.
